summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a snowy mountainous environment in a video game, where the player character is approaching a group of four enemies. The enemies appear humanoid, with one wielding a large weapon. The user interface shows several icons on the bottom left corner, likely representing abilities or items, each assigned to a button (RT). The bottom center displays a health bar, stamina bar, and possibly a special ability meter. On the bottom right, a mini-map is visible, providing navigation assistance. Additionally, the text "Will x4" appears on the right side, possibly indicating a resource or ability count. The scene suggests an impending combat encounter in a challenging terrain.
